featured.text: According to the article, which of the following is TRUE about medicines for colds? (A) They can cure the common cold.
According to this article, PBS received part of its funding from _________.
What is the best title for this article? (A)
We closely followed the advice in your article.

other.text: What is this article mainly about? (A)
Robot Redford’s speech was discussed in this article mainly because .
This article about fantasy literature is intended to __________.
Which of the following statements can be inferred from the article?
What is the purpose of the article? (A)
What is this article mainly about? (A)
According to this article, digital cameras nowadays are used mainly by __________.
What is the main purpose of this article? (A)
Which of the following is TRUE according to the article?
Which of the following is the best title for the article? (A) Mating of Flashlight Fish and Fireflies.
What is the article mainly about? (A)
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as one of the “countries of origin” in the article?
We may infer from the article that Dumas ________.

definition.zh_def: 文章；報導；物品的條款或項目。
definition.en_def: A piece of writing included with others in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.
definition.example: She wrote an article about climate change for the local newspaper.
